questions.question: They made the child …………………………. the milk.
questions.description: Made is followed by an infinitive without to.

questions.question: They forced me ……………………………… the papers.
questions.description: Forced is followed by an infinitive with to.

questions.question: The boy was not allowed …………………………….. the exam.
questions.description: Allow is followed by an infinitive with to.

questions.question: They let him ………………………………..
questions.description: Let is followed by an infinitive without to.

questions.question: She prevented him ………………………………….. her room.
questions.description: Prevent is followed by object + from + ing form

questions.question: The mother encouraged the boy ……………………………. again.
questions.description: Encourage is followed by object + to-infinitive.

questions.question: Children should be discouraged ………………………………..
questions.description: Discourage is followed by from + ing form.

questions.question: You should stop him ………………………………..
questions.description: Stop is followed by from + ing form.

questions.question: Stringent punishments deter people ……………………………………. crimes.
questions.description: Deter is followed by object + from + ing form.

questions.question: I remember …………………………………… him as  a child.
